org.apache.hadoop.registry.server.integration

类 RMRegistryOperationsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.service.AbstractService
      • org.apache.hadoop.service.CompositeService
        • org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.impl.zk.CuratorService
          • org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.impl.zk.RegistryOperationsService
            • org.apache.hadoop.registry.server.services.RegistryAdminService
              • org.apache.hadoop.registry.server.integration.RMRegistryOperationsService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, RegistryConstants, RegistryOperations, RegistryBindingSource, org.apache.hadoop.service.Service

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="YARN")
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class RMRegistryOperationsService
extends RegistryAdminService
    Handle RM events by updating the registry

    These actions are all implemented as event handlers to operations which come from the RM.

    This service is expected to be executed by a user with the permissions to manipulate the entire registry,

      • serviceInit

        protected void serviceInit(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                    throws Exception
        Extend the parent service initialization by verifying that the service knows —in a secure cluster— the realm in which it is executing. It needs this to properly build up the user names and hence their access rights.
        覆盖:
        serviceInit 在类中 RegistryAdminService
        参数:
        conf - configuration of the service
        抛出:
        Exception

      • purgeRecordsAsync

        public Future<Integer> purgeRecordsAsync(String path,
                                String id,
                                String persistencePolicyMatch)
        Queue an async operation to purge all matching records under a base path.
        1. Uses a depth first search
        2. A match is on ID and persistence policy, or, if policy==-1, any match
        3. If a record matches then it is deleted without any child searches
        4. Deletions will be asynchronous if a callback is provided
        参数:
        path - base path
        id - ID for service record.id
        persistencePolicyMatch - ID for the persistence policy to match: no match, no delete.
        返回:
        a future that returns the #of records deleted

      • purgeRecordsAsync

        public Future<Integer> purgeRecordsAsync(String path,
                                String id,
                                String persistencePolicyMatch,
                                RegistryAdminService.PurgePolicy purgePolicy,
                                org.apache.curator.framework.api.BackgroundCallback callback)
        Queue an async operation to purge all matching records under a base path.
        1. Uses a depth first search
        2. A match is on ID and persistence policy, or, if policy==-1, any match
        3. If a record matches then it is deleted without any child searches
        4. Deletions will be asynchronous if a callback is provided
        参数:
        path - base path
        id - ID for service record.id
        persistencePolicyMatch - ID for the persistence policy to match: no match, no delete.
        purgePolicy - how to react to children under the entry
        callback - an optional callback
        返回:
        a future that returns the #of records deleted
